backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend canister with product, customer, cart, and order types plus storage, authorization, Stripe config, and in-memory maps for runtime data.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that resets stored admin credentials to null while preserving other state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend update to the admin setup flow with related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing layout, components, styling, and feature sections.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base/theme variables and dark-mode definitions for colors, borders, and layout styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, fonts, and root mount point for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app router wiring routes for shop, auth, registration, orders, payments, and admin within providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCrede: Admin UI form enabling username/password updates with validation, success alerting, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Component for viewing the current principal, validating principal IDs, checking user roles, and granting admin privileges.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReset: UI card that warns about and initiates an admin reset process requiring confirmation and a backend redeployment.
frontend/src/components/admin/InitialAdm: Form for setting initial admin username and password, including validation and post‑setup reload logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginF: Admin login form that validates credentials and triggers authentication via a backend hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that handles Internet Identity login/logout states with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Gatekeeper component that shows admin setup, admin login, or protected content based on admin status and configuration.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Ensures the user is authenticated with Internet Identity, showing a login prompt if not.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRegi: Wrapper that checks customer profile; shows loading or prompts registration before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/landing/About.ts: Renders an About section with key features and a description of Farmgrew's vegetarian offerings.
frontend/src/components/landing/Categori: Empty file placeholder for a categories section.
frontend/src/components/landing/Category: Empty file placeholder for a category card component.
frontend/src/components/landing/DietPlan: Displays selectable vegetarian diet plans with icons, benefits, focus areas, and a select button.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with brand info, quick links with smooth scrolling, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx: Landing hero section with headline, call‑to‑action buttons, and decorative visuals.
frontend/src/components/landing/Nutritio: Nutrition calculator that manages basket items, integrates products and cart actions, and pre-fills based on selected diet plan.
frontend/src/components/landing/Recommen: Interactive AI recommendations UI that updates goals and preferences based on selected plan and displays personalized suggestions.
frontend/src/components/landing/ServiceA: Renders a section showing current and upcoming service locations using styled cards.
frontend/src/components/landing/TopNav.t: Navigation bar handling routing, scroll-to-section behavior, cart count, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/Container: Wrapper component providing consistent horizontal padding and centered layout.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderTrac: Displays an order's status history as a timeline with icons, timestamps, and notes.
frontend/src/components/shop/CategoryFil: Category selection tabs allowing users to filter products by category.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductCard: Product display card with image fallback logic, price, description, and add‑to‑cart handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Mutation hook to authenticate an admin and map backend errors to user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCredentials.t: Mutation hook for updating admin credentials with error mapping and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Hooks for listing, granting, revoking, and checking admin roles via actor calls with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Admin-only hooks for managing products, including listing, creating, updating, deleting, and uploading images.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminReset.ts: Provides a mutation to trigger admin configuration reset, currently limited to throwing a redeploy-required error.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Cart management hooks for fetching, adding, updating, removing, and clearing cart items.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomer.ts: Hooks for retrieving and registering customer profiles tied to authenticated identities.
Hooks to check admin setup state and set initial admin credentials with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks for listing orders, fetching orders by ID, placing orders, and marking orders as paid.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Hooks to fetch product lists by category and retrieve individual products by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripe.ts: Hooks for Stripe configuration, creating checkout sessions, and polling session status.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus utility classes for spacing and text balance.
frontend/src/lib/dietPlans.ts: Exports diet plan types and a list of predefined diet plans with descriptions, benefits, and focus areas.
frontend/src/lib/nutritionData.ts: Provides nutrition item data, related interfaces, and a function to calculate total nutrition values for a basket.
frontend/src/lib/productImage.ts: Generates normalized product image paths and provides an inline SVG fallback image.
frontend/src/lib/recommendationsData.ts: Defines goals, dietary preferences, recommendation data, and logic to filter recommendations based on user preferences.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements a full admin interface for managing products and Stripe configuration with forms, dialogs, and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the shopping cart, handles quantity updates, removal, total calculation, and initiates Stripe checkout.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed info for a single order, including items, status, payment info, and timeline, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists all user orders with status, payment indicators, and navigation to individual order pages.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows payment failure details using Stripe session status and offers navigation to retry or view orders.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Validates Stripe payment success, marks the order as paid, and lets users navigate to the order or shop.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Handles customer registration or profile update with form inputs, loading, and success state.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Displays product catalog with category filtering, loading/error states, and navigation to product details or admin.
frontend/src/router/navigation.ts: Provides functions to push a new path to history and check if a route is active.
frontend/src/router/usePathname.ts: React hook that tracks and returns the current URL pathname using popstate events.
frontend/src/sections/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component composing multiple sections and managing selected diet plan state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state file describing schema version, issues, features, and new feature requests related to admin reset and setup.
